upgrade.description: upgrade old projects to new monaca cli 3.0.0 structure
longDescription: Allow user to use old projects created using Monaca 2.x with Monaca 3.x.
The dev dependencies and Cordova will be moved into the project and new commands will be injected into package.json to be able to execute some commands such as monaca preview or monaca debug.
options: creates a basic package.json file with name and description.
